translations.literal: Cook Hong Yang, heaven then rains.'

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：農工商交易之路通，而龜貝金錢刀布之幣興焉。

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: Farmer craftsman merchant exchange roads connected, turtle shells cowries gold money knife cloth currency arose.

sentences.zh: 所從來久遠，自高辛氏之前尚矣，靡得而記云。

translations.literal: Source came long distant, from Gao Xin Shi before still, cannot obtain record.

sentences.zh: 故書道唐虞之際，詩述殷周之世，安寧則長庠序，先本絀末，以禮義防于利；

translations.literal: Therefore Classic wrote Tang Yu time, Poetry described Yin Zhou age, peaceful then long schools, first fundamentals last branches, with rites righteousness defended against profit;

sentences.zh: 事變多故而亦反是。

translations.literal: affairs changed many troubles then also opposite.

sentences.zh: 是以物盛則衰，時極而轉，一質一文，終始之變也。

translations.literal: Therefore things flourish then decline, time extreme then turn, one substance one pattern, beginning end changes.

sentences.zh: 禹貢九州，各因其土地所宜，人民所多少而納職焉。

translations.literal: Yu Gong nine provinces, each followed their land suitable, people many few delivered duties.

sentences.zh: 湯武承獘易變，使民不倦，各兢兢所以為治，而稍陵遲衰微。

translations.literal: Tang Wu received exhaustion easily changed, made people not tired, each diligent so governed, gradually declined weakened.

sentences.zh: 齊桓公用管仲之謀，通輕重之權，徼山海之業，以朝諸侯，用區區之齊顯成霸名。

translations.literal: Qi Huan Gong used Guan Zhong strategy, passed light heavy authority, seized mountains seas occupations, to make feudal lords court, used small small Qi displayed completed hegemon name.

sentences.zh: 魏用李克，盡地力，為彊君。

translations.literal: Wei used Li Ke, exhausted land strength, became strong lord.

sentences.zh: 自是以後，天下爭於戰國，貴詐力而賤仁義，先富有而後推讓。

translations.literal: From this after, realm contended Warring States, honored deception force despised benevolence righteousness, first wealthy then yielded.

sentences.zh: 故庶人之富者或累巨萬，而貧者或不厭糟糠；

translations.literal: Therefore common people rich sometimes accumulated vast millions, poor sometimes not satisfied chaff bran;

sentences.zh: 有國彊者或并群小以臣諸侯，而弱國或絕祀而滅世。

translations.literal: having country strong sometimes annexed small groups to subject feudal lords, weak countries sometimes cut sacrifices extinguished generations.

sentences.zh: 以至於秦，卒并海內。

translations.literal: To Qin, finally unified within seas.

sentences.zh: 虞夏之幣，金為三品，或黃，或白，或赤；

translations.literal: Yu Xia currency, gold three grades, or yellow, or white, or red;

sentences.zh: 或錢，或布，或刀，或龜貝。

translations.literal: or money, or cloth, or knife, or turtle cowries.

sentences.zh: 及至秦，中一國之幣為（三）［二］等，黃金以溢名，為上幣；

translations.literal: To Qin, unified country's currency two grades, gold with overflow named, upper currency;

sentences.zh: 銅錢識曰半兩，重如其文，為下幣。

translations.literal: copper money marked half liang, heavy like inscription, lower currency.

sentences.zh: 而珠玉、龜貝、銀錫之屬為器飾寶藏，不為幣。

translations.literal: Pearl jade, turtle cowries, silver tin kinds as utensil decorations treasures storage, not currency.

sentences.zh: 然各隨時而輕重無常。

translations.literal: But each followed time light heavy no constant.

sentences.zh: 於是外攘夷狄，內興功業，海內之士力耕不足糧馕，女子紡績不足衣服。

translations.literal: Therefore externally expelled barbarians, internally raised achievements, within seas scholars labored farmed insufficient food clothing, women spun wove insufficient clothing.

sentences.zh: 古者嘗竭天下之資財以奉其上，猶自以為不足也。

translations.literal: Ancient often exhausted realm wealth to serve above, still self considered insufficient.

sentences.zh: 無異故云，事勢之流，相激使然，曷足怪焉。

translations.literal: No different so say, affairs trends flow, mutually stimulated made so, why sufficient strange.
